source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: 3d Coat Sculpture Modelling, Retopo , UVs and Paint
items.headline: An exploration of everything you need to master the powerful 3D Coat
objectives_summary: Block out volumes using voxel tools
Refine and details using surface tools and live clay
Manually retopo the model using the amazing retopo tools

items.title: Blender Quickstart - Create a Low poly scene for Beginners
items.headline: Create your own 3d scene using Blender in this fun project based course
objectives_summary: Create basic models in Blender
Create and mix materials in Blender
Create and adjust lighting in Blender

items.title: Learning  Cinema 4D Lite For After Effects
items.headline: Learn how to use Cinema 4D (Lite) in conduction with Adobe After Effects. A definitive course from Infinite Skills
objectives_summary: Learn how to use Cinema 4D with After Effects

items.title: Cinema 4D - Looping 3D Animation for Instagram and GIF
items.headline: Level up your Cinema 4D skills and be able to create your very own looping 3D animation!
objectives_summary: Create your very own looping 3D animation in Cinema 4D and upload it to social media

items.title: Adobe After Effects CC : Logo Animation with Motion Graphics

visible_instructors.name: Sunny
visible_instructors.title: Sunny Heera
visible_instructors.job_title: Animator, Motion Designer and Visual Effects Artists

items.headline: Learn how to create a logo animation with motion graphics in Adobe After Effects CC today!
objectives_summary: You will have expert level knowledge of Adobe After Effects CC in this course, whether you are a beginner, intermediate or have no previous knowledge of After Effects.
You will be able to create a logo animation with motion graphics from scratch by creating a real-world project in Adobe After Effects CC.
You will learn about particles, expressions, animations paths, and more!

items.title: Stylized Cyberpunk girl in Zbrush course
items.headline: Learn how to make a stylized character  with hard surface weapon and accessories only in Zbrush
objectives_summary: Creating a stylized anatomy
Creating hard surface weapon and accessories in Zbrush
Posing and rendering with Zbrush and Photoshop

items.title: Create a Brilliant 3D Explainer Video for Your Business
items.headline: Discover how to teach, delight and bond with new customers in seconds
objectives_summary: Define exactly who my customer is, and what they want
Photoshop CC training for creating our storyboard
After Effects CC training for animation and visual effects

items.title: Hec-RAS and ArcGIS for Hydrologic Engineering

visible_instructors.job_title: Specialists in GIS - BIM - LAND and Smart process training
visible_instructors.name: AulaGEO
visible_instructors.title: AulaGEO Academy

items.headline: Discover the potentialities of Hec-RAS and Hec-GeoRAS for channel modeling and flood analysis #hecras
objectives_summary: Perform hydraulic studies of natural or artificial channels.
Evaluate areas of flooding of rivers and streams.
Plan the territory based on areas of flooding or hydraulic public domain.

items.title: 3D Painting using FlowScape: Paint Dream Worlds in 3D (2021)

visible_instructors.name: Srinidhi
visible_instructors.title: Srinidhi Ranganathan
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Marketing Legend: King of AI - 7,00,000+ Students

items.headline: MBA in Creative Arts, Design and Animation: Level 3 - Part 5 course that focusses on 3D Painting using FlowScape
objectives_summary: Paint New-Age Islands and Worlds in Digital 3D using FlowScape with simply using your mouse and keyboard
Learn to drag and drop objects such as rocks, logs, twigs and leaves in real-time physics into your nature scene
Learn to insert lifelike 3D models and animals into your nature scene

visible_instructors.job_title: Motion Graphics / Visual Effects / Video Editing

objectives_summary: Learn how to create lower thirds using After Effects
Professionally package your Project for Resale Within After Effects
Master Clear and Clean Methods to create animations for resale

items.title: Learning Cinema 4D - Mastering Cinema 4D Made Easy
items.headline: Master Maxon Cinema 4D. Learn how to create stunning animation effects. A easy to follow course from Infinite Skills
objectives_summary: Learn how to master Maxon Cinema 4D quickly

items.title: Learn 2D Animation w/ Toon Boom & Create Your Own Cartoons!

visible_instructors.name: Tony
visible_instructors.title: Tony Ross
visible_instructors.job_title: Video Trainer, Instructor, and Author: Learning Made Simple!

items.headline: Discover how 2D animations are made, how simply you can create your own, and share your animation with the world!
objectives_summary: You will learn, how to use the professional 2D animation software Toon Boom Animate 3
You'll learn how to work with digital puppets to create your own character animation.

items.title: Create amazing animations fast and easy using After Effects
items.headline: Learn how to animate your illustrations in After effects with the minimum effort. Be productive!!
objectives_summary: Tips & tricks to speed up your work process
How to apply expressions, effects, layer Styles ...
How to prepare your illustrations efficiently for After Effects

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional instructor of 3D and VFX certified by Autodesk

Create custom controls.
Add both IK and FK modes.

Create 3D models with simple modeling skill
